title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL AND BIO-ENVIRONMENTAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Title: Agricultural and Bio-environmental Engineering

Direct Entry Requirements:

N/A
utme_requirements:
Title: Agricultural and Bio-environmental Engineering

UTME Requirements:

Imo State Polytechnic requires FIVE (5) CREDITS in Agricultural and Bio-Environmental Engineering Technology Department as follows:

 

MATHEMATICS,

PHYSICS,

 AND ANY THREE OF THE FOLLOWING:

 BIOLOGY/AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE

 CHEMISTRY

 TECHNICAL DRAWING

 BASIC ELECTRONICS/BASIC ELECTRICITY

 AUTO MECHANICS

 METAL WORK

 FURTHER MATHEMATICS

 FOOD AND NUTRITION

 GEOGRAPHY

CREDIT PASSES IN CHEMISTRY, MATHEMATICS, PHYSICS AND A PASS IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE ARE COMPULSORY
subjects:
Title: Agricultural and Bio-environmental Engineering

UTME Subjects:

Use of English, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

Metal Work

Food and Nutrition

Five (5) SCC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,
